title: How to Make Lined Paper in Word 2007

steps.title: You'll want to start with a blank sheet.
steps.content: You'll want to start with a blank sheet. This will allow you to fill the entire page with lines.

steps.title: This button is at the top of Word and looks sort of like a window.
steps.content: This button is at the top of Word and looks sort of like a window. This displays a variety of borders you can add to tables.

steps.title: This option creates a large skinny box on the page.
steps.content: This option creates a large skinny box on the page. Once you add lines to this box, it will expand to fit the page.

steps.title: Each time you press Enter, you'll see more lines appear.
steps.content: Each time you press Enter, you'll see more lines appear. Keep pressing the enter button until your page is full with those boxes. Once you've reached the end of the page, you'll have lined paper! Now you can print it on any printer.
